A garden hose that doubles as a sprinkler system: This idea is great for gardeners who want to save time and water while watering their plants. The hose would have a built-in sprinkler system that can be easily adjusted to water the plants at different heights and angles.

The hose would change color based on the temperature, making it easy to know if the water is too hot or too cold.

The hose would have a built-in water pressure gauge that indicates the pressure of the water, making it easy to adjust the water flow.

A garden hose that has a built-in water-saving device: This would be great for gardeners who want to conserve water while still providing their plants with the necessary hydration. The hose would have a built-in water-saving device that reduces the amount of water wasted while watering the garden.
